      • getExplanationResult

        public static java.lang.String getExplanationResult(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAxiom axiom,
                                                    org.semanticweb.owlapi.reasoner.OWLReasoner reasoner,
                                                    org.semanticweb.owlapi.reasoner.OWLReasonerFactory factory,
                                                    org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ontology,
                                                    java.lang.Boolean enableDict,
                                                    boolean asHTML,
                                                    boolean obf)
        Compute textual explanations in English
        Parameters:
        axiom - -- the conclusion for which an explanation is desired
        reasoner - -- the reasoner to be employed for justification finding
        factory - -- the reasoner factory of the employed reasoner
        ontology - -- the current ontology
        enableDict - -- whether to use WordNet (to take into account nouns/adjectives and plural forms in class names)
        asHTML - -- whether or not get HTML output
        obf - -- whether or not get clear/readable Text
        Returns:
        -- a text string containing the explanation
